Compiler Support¶

Compilers for which xolotl has been known to work (or not).

OS Compiler Version Works
macOS 10.12.6 clang Apple LLVM version 9.0.0 ✓
Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS g++ 6.3 ✓
Ubuntu 17.04 g++ 4.8.5 ✓
Ubuntu 17.04 g++ 6.3 ❌
Ubuntu 17.04 g++ 7.0.1 ❌
Ubuntu 17.10 g++ 6.4 ❌
Ubuntu 17.10 g++ 7.3 ❌
Ubuntu 17.10 g++ 4.8 ✓
Manjaro Linux g++ 7.3 ✓
